title: WTB: Have you seen me? T206 Magee Portrait I would love to buy back.
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB: Have you seen me? T206 Magee Portrait I would love to buy back.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Trae R.
I bought this card from Steve (Jacklitsch) in March of 2006, then sold it in April or May of 2006, but I can't recall to whom. Do you have it? If so I'd love to buy it back, I miss it.

Edited to add, I wouldn't mind seeing any other Magee portraits for sale. I'm looking for a well centered and registered version with a clean front.

[IMG]http://www.t206.org/misc/magee.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]
